columns.name: name
columns.description: The friendly name that identifies the server.

columns.name: id
columns.description: Contains ID to identify a server uniquely.

columns.name: type
columns.description: The resource type of the server.

columns.name: state
columns.description: The state of the server.

columns.name: version
columns.description: Specifies the version of the server.

columns.name: administrator_login
columns.description: The administrator's login name of a server.

columns.name: availability_zone
columns.description: Availability Zone information of the server.

columns.name: backup_retention_days
columns.description: Backup retention days for the server.

columns.name: create_mode
columns.description: The mode to create a new server.

columns.name: earliest_restore_date
columns.description: Specifies the earliest restore point creation time.

columns.name: fully_qualified_domain_name
columns.description: The fully qualified domain name of the server.

columns.name: geo_redundant_backup
columns.description: Indicates whether Geo-redundant is enabled, or not for server backup.

columns.name: location
columns.description: The server location.

columns.name: public_network_access
columns.description: Whether or not public network access is allowed for this server.

columns.name: replica_capacity
columns.description: The maximum number of replicas that a primary server can have.

columns.name: replication_role
columns.description: The replication role of the server.

columns.name: restore_point_in_time
columns.description: Restore point creation time (ISO8601 format), specifying the time to restore from.

columns.name: sku_name
columns.description: The name of the sku.

columns.name: sku_tier
columns.description: The tier of the particular SKU.

columns.name: source_server_resource_id
columns.description: The source MySQL server id.

columns.name: storage_auto_grow
columns.description: Indicates whether storage auto grow is enabled, or not.

columns.name: storage_iops
columns.description: Storage IOPS for a server.

columns.name: storage_size_gb
columns.description: Indicates max storage allowed for a server.

columns.name: storage_sku
columns.description: The sku name of the server storage.

columns.name: flexible_server_configurations
columns.description: The server configurations(parameters) details of the server.

columns.name: high_availability
columns.description: High availability related properties of a server.

columns.name: network
columns.description: Network related properties of a server.

columns.name: maintenance_window
columns.description: Maintenance window of a server.

columns.name: system_data
columns.description: The system metadata relating to this server.

columns.name: title
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTitle

columns.name: tags
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTags

columns.name: region
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionRegion

columns.name: resource_group
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionResourceGroup
